translation.intro:
hello! Thank you for visiting my website!
I am a full-stack developer and currently working as a front-end developer.
I became a developer because I love creation & design & new thingsðŸ¤©
Hobbies and specialties is a foreign language! I'm interested in foreign cultures.
I'm also interested in the visual aspect, so I'm trying to do 3D modeling as a hobby.
I've created a React UI library that's convenient for markup. Or, please leave an e-mail.
translation.outro: This website is made with Mi library.

skills.name: React
skills.content: I have experience in servicing using the Ionic framework. We are working on a React UI library.

skills.name: Angular

skills.name: Node.js
